title: Keep Them Warm
desc: Make sure your pets have warm bedding and are not exposed to cold floors during winter nights.

title: Hydration is Key
desc: Pets can dehydrate even in cold weather. Always keep their water bowl clean and full.

title: Protect Their Paws
desc: Use pet-safe paw balm to prevent cracks and irritation from snow or rough surfaces.

title: Balanced Diet
desc: Feed a protein-rich diet to help your pets maintain energy and warmth throughout the season.
